name: Bryce Escape Room
description:
Let the music guide you to the key; find the door; get to the next level. Each room has only one key, which is beside the working music box.

Note: For some reason, my Substances don't work properly in the browser. So to get the full experience, download the correct offline version (Win and Mac).

Note: Directly inspired by a former student of mine (Bryce).

Commands (FPS):

  • First, click inside the game view  (turn off the mouse pointer)
  • ESC: re-enables the cursor again
  • WASD / Arrows: navigate
  • Mouse: look around
  • Left-click: interact with key and door
  • Shift: hold down with WASD to run

Assets were generously made free by the respective authors:

  • music
  • music box
  • key
  • table
  • crawler
  • door
  • floor
